articles.author: Lindsay Clark
articles.title: 5G satellite briefly becomes brightest object in night sky - The Register
articles.description: With more constellations on the horizon, scientists call for better approval of launches
articles.content: A recently launched 5G satellite periodically becomes the brightest object in the night sky, alarming astronomers who reckon it sometimes becomes hundreds of times brighter than the current recommend… [+2910 chars]
